name: WPSClient4ArcGIS v1.4.0
body:
The WPS ArcMap client enables ArcGIS desktop consumption of WPS Processes enlarging the amount of tools available to users for geoprocessing spatial information. 
With the client it is possible to select one or more layers in ArcMap and use them as input for WPS processes. 
The result of the processes can be visualized in ArcMap again.
 
## Changes since last release
 
### New features ---
 
- Use newest arctic-sea and javaPS version
- Use different method to obtain installation directory
- Added support for ArcMap 10.7+

Download the client installer from here: [WPSClient4ArcGIS 1.3.0 Installer](https://52north.org/delivery/WPSClient4ArcGIS/52n-Extensible-WPS-ArcMap-Client-1.4.0-Setup.exe) 
**Note:** The ArcGIS Interoperabilty Extension needs to be installed, a license is not necessary. Also, please disable background processing in ArcMap.
